DATA.description: Allows to read Issues master data and aggregated elements (e.g. changes of status protocol)
DATA.name: Issues: Read Master Data

DATA.description: Allows to write (create, copy, modify, delete) Issues master data and aggregated elements (e.g. changes of status protocol)
DATA.name: Issues: Write Master Data

DATA.description: Allows to change the status of Issues.
DATA.name: Issues: Change of Status

DATA.description: Allows to export the Project Issues Report.
DATA.name: Issues: Report Project Issues

DATA.description: Allows to export the Task Issues Report.
DATA.name: Issues: Report Task Issues

DATA.description: Allows to maintain the catalogs needed for Issues.
DATA.name: Issues: Write Basic Catalogs

DATA.description: Allows to maintain the catalogs used/referenced by Issue logic.
DATA.name: Issues: Write Logic Catalogs

DATA.description: Allows to read references from Issue to Actions.
DATA.name: Issue Actions: Read

DATA.description: Allows to write references from Issue to Actions.
DATA.name: Issue Actions: Write Assignments
